name: Dance with Witch
description:
Once, there was a nameless land, where winds of magic flow. In a quiet town located around a distant corner, a girl lived alone. She accepted quests from Adventurers Association, and made a living from doing so. No one knew anything about her, let alone her family, also townspeople were curious, the girl would always avoid the topic of her past . 

This game was made possible by 4 people from multiple backgrounds for 2018 Music Game Jam.

Instructions

In the game scene, player can use 5 keys to control the character:

[↑], [←], [→] for beating the note

[A], [D] for dodging

: press once when the note has this symbol : press keys together when the note has this symbol
